Derric van Rensburg (amụrụ n'afọ 1952 na Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe a ma ama n'ụwa niile.

Kemgbe ngosi mbụ ya na Cape Town na 1976 ndị ahịa dị iche iche nke gụnyere ndị ahịa ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dịka First National Bank, South African Airways, Price Waterhouse Coopers na Mobil enyela van Rensburg ọrụ. A maara ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile ma a na-ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị elu na South Africa. Onye Britain na-ese ihe JJ Adams rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ van Rensburg mgbe ezinụlọ ya si UK kwaga South Africa ma kwuo na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị nwee mmetụta.
Emere emume ọrụ van Rensburg n'akwụkwọ tebụl kọfị e bipụtara na 2007 iji kwekọọ na ụbọchị ọmụmụ iri ise na ise nke onye na-ese ihe.
